<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Druid's Vestments](/Equipment.aspx?ID=434)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 610 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn garment

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This brown-and-green tunic is embroidered with patterns that resemble interlocking elk antlers. You gain a +2 item bonus to Nature checks.

<document level="2" id="action-251" />

**Craft Requirements** You are a druid.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Druid's Vestments
